Summary: at 3 AM while on my way to my shop i witnessed , and others as well ,neon green pulsating and purple pulsating flashes in sky. no beam coming from ground. huge about a mile long
divs: Sighting Detailsat 3 AM while on my way to my shop i witnessed , and others as well ,neon green pulsating and purple pulsating flashes in sky. no beam coming from ground. huge about a mile long. i and my friend, who will testify to this including others. what was strange was the color of this neon green flash and how BRIGHT in the sky, easily noticeble in the dark night sky so im sure many others seen it. it slowly sort of dimed out but to out amazement purple lighting sort of flashes started to pulsat in the same area....Im telling u this was no lightning in the sky plus in made no sound....someone said it may have been some gas explosion in the sky...this was no gas pulsating like THIS....strange im telling u. I HOPe others come out and say what they saw....something in the sky was causing these huge green and purple pulsating flashes and it was something i never seen before
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Richardson
